Package index

All functions

breaks_time()
Determine axis breaks automatically for time variables
data_sad
Example NONMEM Analysis-Ready Dataset for PK Modeling of a Single Ascending Dose Study
df_addpred()
Add population predictions (PRED) to a data.frame
df_mrgsim_replicate()
Execute a visual predictive check (VPC) simulation using mrgsolve
df_nobsbin()
Count the non-missing observations in each exact bin
df_pcdv()
Perform prediction-correction of the dependent variable
model_mread_load()
Load an mrgsolve model file from the internal model library
plot_dvtime()
Plot a dependent variable versus time
plot_legend()
Plot a legend for a visual predictive check (VPC)
plot_vpc_exactbins()
Plot a visual predictive check (VPC) with exact time bins
